en: How drones and AI are changing the way we fight wildfires. As the threat of wildfires intensifies, modern technology is playing an increasingly large role in both research and management. But not all communities have access to it.

title: 'One of the scariest moments of my life': Volunteer firefighters reflect on Kingston wildfire
description: The Kingston wildfire lasted nearly the full month of August, destroying over 200 homes across Conception Bay North. It deeply impacted members of the North Shore Volunteer Fire Department who say they never expected to experience a wildfire of such magnitude.

Es hat die Mitglieder der Freiwilligen Feuerwehr North Shore zutiefst getroffen, die sagen, sie hätten nie damit gerechnet, einen Waldbrand dieser Größenordnung zu erleben.
en: 'One of the scariest moments of my life': Volunteer firefighters reflect on Kingston wildfire. The Kingston wildfire lasted nearly the full month of August, destroying over 200 homes across Conception Bay North. It deeply impacted members of the North Shore Volunteer Fire Department who say they never expected to experience a wildfire of such magnitude.

title: Working with local communities is a vital part of wildfire response
description: The challenge is not firefighting capacity nor convincing people to help; it is coordinating efforts to prioritize safety and efficiency.

Die Herausforderung besteht nicht darin, die Kapazitäten zur Brandbekämpfung bereitzustellen oder die Menschen davon zu überzeugen, zu helfen. Es koordiniert die Bemühungen, Sicherheit und Effizienz zu priorisieren.
en: Working with local communities is a vital part of wildfire response. The challenge is not firefighting capacity nor convincing people to help; it is coordinating efforts to prioritize safety and efficiency.

title: How drones and AI are changing the way we fight wildfires
description: As the threat of wildfires intensifies, modern technology is playing an increasingly large role in both research and management. But not all communities have access to it.

title: Realtor.com and Yahoo News Are Wrong: Insurance Is Not Rising Due to Climate Change
description: Looking at the report cited, the risks highlighted are flooding, hurricane wind damage, and wildfires. The problem for Realtor.com is that none of those weather conditions have increased over time.
content:
Guest essay by Linnea Lueken Originally published on Climate Realism

In dem zitierten Bericht werden als Risiken Überschwemmungen, Hurrikanwindschäden und Waldbrände hervorgehoben. Das Problem für Realtor.com besteht darin, dass keine dieser Wetterbedingungen im Laufe der Zeit zugenommen hat.

Das in Minneapolis ansässige Unternehmen Xcel Energy gab am Mittwoch bekannt, dass es voraussichtlich etwa 640 Millionen US-Dollar zahlen wird, um Klagen beizulegen, in denen behauptet wird, es sei für den Ausbruch des verheerendsten Waldbrandes in Colorado verantwortlich gewesen, bei dem im Jahr 2021 zwei Menschen ums Leben kamen und fast 1.000 Häuser zerstört wurden.

title: Watch Duty app is revolutionizing how residents, firefighters stay updated on wildfires
description: Two techies launched the app in 2021 to fill a glaring information gap. Watch Duty centralizes fire and evacuation updates from various agencies, as paid staff reporters and an army of volunteers provide real-time updates based on radio traffic.
content:

It looks like it's near the mall in Carlsbad along the 78, said Winstead, a staff reporter with Wa… [+10331 chars]

Zwei Technikfreaks brachten die App im Jahr 2021 auf den Markt, um eine eklatante Informationslücke zu schließen. Watch Duty zentralisiert Brand- und Evakuierungsaktualisierungen verschiedener Behörden, während bezahlte Reporter und eine Armee von Freiwilligen Echtzeitaktualisierungen basierend auf dem Funkverkehr bereitstellen.

la: Poway ut patet milia arborum ex igne ferum euacuatione itinerum. Locis principalibus ubi arbores removebuntur sunt Twin cacumina Road, Espola Road et Vallis Viridis Patefacio.

title: People living near Annapolis Valley wildfire told to prepare for possible evacuation
description: An emergency alert has been issued urging residents living near the Lake George wildfire to be ready to leave their homes if needed.
content:
Residents close to the site of the Lake George wildfire in the Annapolis Valley are being told to be prepared to evacuate their homes if needed.
In an emergency alert issued just after 5 p.m. Monday… [+728 chars]
de: Menschen, die in der Nähe des Waldbrandes im Annapolis Valley leben, wurden aufgefordert, sich auf eine mögliche Evakuierung vorzubereiten. Es wurde eine Notfallwarnung herausgegeben, in der die Bewohner in der Nähe des Waldbrandes am Lake George aufgefordert werden, bereit zu sein, bei Bedarf ihre Häuser zu verlassen.
en: People living near Annapolis Valley wildfire told to prepare for possible evacuation. An emergency alert has been issued urging residents living near the Lake George wildfire to be ready to leave their homes if needed.
la: Homines prope Annapolim in valle habitantes ignem ferum nuntiaverunt se ad evacuationem fieri posse. Subitis erectus est hortatus incolas prope lacum Georges ignem ferum habitantes edixit ut parati essent ad domos suas exeundi si opus esset.

title: Evacuations ordered as Annapolis Valley wildfire grows
description: The Lake George wildfire has grown to 80 hectares and is now considered out of control.
content:
The Lake George wildfire in Nova Scotia's Annapolis Valley is now considered out of control and an evacuation order has been issued for residents living nearby.
In an emergency alert issued just aft… [+891 chars]
de: Evakuierungen werden angeordnet, da der Waldbrand im Annapolis Valley zunimmt. Der Waldbrand am Lake George ist auf 80 Hektar angewachsen und gilt nun als außer Kontrolle.
en: Evacuations ordered as Annapolis Valley wildfire grows. The Lake George wildfire has grown to 80 hectares and is now considered out of control.
la: Evacuationes iusserunt ut Annapolis Vallis incendium ferum adolescit. Lacus George incendium ignem ad 80 hectares crevit et nunc extra imperium censetur.

title: Guidance: Wildfire management plan
description: You may need to complete a wildfire management plan if you're applying for a licence to burn heather or grass on peat deeper than 30cm in a less favoured area .
content:

de: Leitfaden: Waldbrandmanagementplan. Möglicherweise müssen Sie einen Waldbrandmanagementplan erstellen, wenn Sie eine Lizenz zum Verbrennen von Heidekraut oder Gras auf Torf mit einer Tiefe von mehr als 30 cm in einem benachteiligten Gebiet beantragen.
en: Guidance: Wildfire management plan. You may need to complete a wildfire management plan if you're applying for a licence to burn heather or grass on peat deeper than 30cm in a less favoured area .
la: Guidance: INCAENDIUM procuratio consilii. Opus est ut consilium administratione ignium perficiat si licentiam adhibeas ut ericam vel gramen in gagatem altius quam 30cm in area minus favorabilis incendat.

Post Rick Scott quaerit Sean Duffy: Quid Cali ...

title: New evacuation alert issued as wildfire burns near Lake George, N.S.
description: Residents on Birch Lane, Spruce Drive and Blue Lane at Aylesford Lake’s southwest end have been told to prepare to evacuate as a wildfire threatens the area.
content:

Residents of Birch Lane, Spruce… [+4647 chars]
de: Neue Evakuierungswarnung wurde ausgegeben, da in der Nähe von Lake George, New South Wales, ein Waldbrand brennt. title: Our AI model can help improve indoor ventilation during wildfire season
description: A new AI-powered simulation model allows researchers and architects to design well-ventilated indoor spaces that keep harmful smoke away.
content: A recent report from the University of Chicagos Air Quality Life Index found that wildfires are worsening air quality in Canada. The report found that in 2023, wildfires caused concentrations of part… [+4686 chars]
de: Unser KI-Modell kann dazu beitragen, die Belüftung von Innenräumen während der Waldbrandsaison zu verbessern. Ein neues KI-gestütztes Simulationsmodell ermöglicht es Forschern und Architekten, gut belüftete Innenräume zu entwerfen, die schädlichen Rauch fernhalten.
en: Our AI model can help improve indoor ventilation during wildfire season. A new AI-powered simulation model allows researchers and architects to design well-ventilated indoor spaces that keep harmful smoke away.
la: Exemplar nostrum AI auxilium meliori tempore VENTILATIO amet in ignem ferum potest. Novum AI-powered simulationis exemplar permittit investigatoribus et architectis ad designandum spatia umbratica bene ventilata quae fumum nocivum servant.

de: Evakuierungen laufen, da das Feuer in Nova Scotia erneut außer Kontrolle gerät. Beamte aus Nova Scotia sagen, ein Waldbrand, der am Sonntagabend ausgebrochen sei, sei wieder außer Kontrolle geraten und eine Evakuierung nahegelegener Campingplätze und Häuser sei im Gange.
en: Evacuations underway as Nova Scotia fire is once again out of control. Nova Scotia officials say a wildfire that broke out Sunday night has reverted back to out-of-control, and an evacuation of nearby campgrounds and homes is underway.
la: Evacuationibus comparatis cum Nova Scotia incendium iterum e potestate est. Novae Scotiae magistratus dicunt ignem ferum exortum ex nocte dominica reversum ad intemperantiam, et comparata evacuatio camporum ac domorum proximarum.

title: Wildfire-induced thunderstorms successfully recreated in Earth system models for the first time

de: Durch Waldbrände verursachte Gewitter wurden erstmals erfolgreich in Erdsystemmodellen nachgebildet. Am 5. September 2020 wurde der Creek Fire in Kalifornien so stark, dass er begann, ein eigenes Wettersystem zu erzeugen. Die extreme Hitze des Feuers erzeugte eine explosive Gewitterwolke, die Blitze ausstieß und die lodernden Flammen noch weiter anfachte, sodass eine Eindämmung unmöglich war …
en: Wildfire-induced thunderstorms successfully recreated in Earth system models for the first time. On September 5, 2020, California's Creek Fire grew so severe that it began producing its own weather system. The fire's extreme heat produced an explosive thunderhead that spewed lightning strikes and further fanned the roaring flames, making containment elus…
la: Ignis impetus tonitribusque exemplaribus primum systematis terrestris feliciter recreavit. Die 5 Septembris 2020, Ignis Creek Californiae tam vehemens est ut incepit systema tempestatis suum producere. Extremus ignis calor tonitruum explosivum profert, quod fulmina evomuit, et ulterius flammas rugientes creseit, continentem elus.

title: Frequent wildfires and heat intensify air quality issues in American megacities
description: Air quality in America's largest cities has steadily improved thanks to tighter regulations on key sources of particulate pollution. However, increased heat, wildfire smoke and other emerging global drivers of urban aerosol pollution are now combining to crea…
content: Air quality in America's largest cities has steadily improved thanks to tighter regulations on key sources of particulate pollution. However, increased heat, wildfire smoke and other emerging global … [+6954 chars]
de: Häufige Waldbrände und Hitze verschärfen die Probleme mit der Luftqualität in amerikanischen Megastädten. Die Luftqualität in den größten Städten Amerikas hat sich dank strengerer Vorschriften zu den Hauptquellen der Feinstaubverschmutzung stetig verbessert. Allerdings führen zunehmende Hitze, Waldbrandrauch und andere aufkommende globale Ursachen der städtischen Aerosolverschmutzung nun zu …
en: Frequent wildfires and heat intensify air quality issues in American megacities. Air quality in America's largest cities has steadily improved thanks to tighter regulations on key sources of particulate pollution. However, increased heat, wildfire smoke and other emerging global drivers of urban aerosol pollution are now combining to crea…
la: Crebrae incendia et aestus in megacitatibus Americanis quaestiones aeris qualitatem auget. Qualitas aeris in maximis Americae urbibus constanter aucta est propter normas arctius de praecipuis pollutionis fontibus clavis. Nihilominus, auctus calor, incendium incendium et alii globi exactores pollutionis aerosol urbanae emergentes nunc ad creandum coniunguntur.

title: Official death count of 2023 Hawaii wildfires doesn’t capture true toll, study suggests
description: Beyond the blaze, wildfires can have rippling effects on a community’s health and the land.
content: In August 2023, the deadliest fires the U.S. had seen in a century tore through Lāhainā, Maui, devastating the town and taking the lives of between 100 and 102 people, according to an official death … [+6360 chars]
de: Die offizielle Zahl der Todesopfer bei den Waldbränden auf Hawaii im Jahr 2023 gibt laut Studie nicht die wahre Zahl wieder. Über das Feuer hinaus können Waldbrände weitreichende Auswirkungen auf die Gesundheit einer Gemeinde und des Landes haben.
en: Official death count of 2023 Hawaii wildfires doesn’t capture true toll, study suggests. Beyond the blaze, wildfires can have rippling effects on a community’s health and the land.
la: Officialis mors comiti 2023 Hawaii incendia silvestria vera vectigalia non capit, studium suggerit. Praeter flammam, ignes flammae sonantes effectus in salute et terra communitatis habere possunt.
